name: The Broken Vow
storyline: After his grandfather Clark's death, John visits his grandmother Emma to see her, only to find the house empty and Emma locked in her room. While waiting, John feels something unusual. When he finally opens her door, she is gone, leaving behind only a barricaded door and a note: "Do not open."
summary: Unravel the mystery by finding notes, objects and memories hidden around the house. Find out what happened to Clark, escape Emma and escape — even if it takes strength.
